METHOD.description: Encryption method, null by default(table), the following methods are supported: AEAD_CHACHA20_POLY1305, aes-128-cfb, aes-192-cfb, aes-256-cfb, bf-cfb, cast5-cfb, des-cfb, rc4-md5, rc4-md5-6, chacha20, salsa20, rc4, table.

PASSWORD.description: A password used to encrypt transfer.
